mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GOODS ORDER BY goods_num DESC

SELECT A.*, ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM goods where goods_best = #{goods_best} ORDER BY goods_date desc
) A WHERE ROWNUM between 0 and 3
mapper.insert: insert into GOODS(goods_num, goods_category, goods_name, goods_image, goods_amount, goods_price, goods_contentimage, goods_delevimage, goods_best, goods_date) values(goods_seq.NEXTVAL, #{goods_category}, #{goods_name}, #{goods_image}, #{goods_amount}, #{goods_price}, #{goods_contentimage}, #{goods_delevimage}, #{goods_best}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET goods_category = #{goods_category}, goods_name = #{goods_name}, goods_image = #{goods_image}, goods_amount = #{goods_amount}, goods_price = #{goods_price}, goods_contentimage = #{goods_contentimage}, goods_delevimage = #{goods_delevimage}, goods_best = #{goods_best}, goods_date = sysdate WHERE goods_num = #{goods_num}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_comment (comment_num, goods_no, cmter, cmt_date, commentt, goods_point ) values ( goods_comment_SEQ.nextval, #{goods_no}, #{cmter}, sysdate, #{commentt}, #{goods_point} )
